createCommands: npx create-next-app@latest mynextapp --ts --tailwind --eslint && cd mynextapp && npm run dev
folderStructure:
mynextapp/
├── pages/
│   ├── index.tsx
│   └── _app.tsx
├── components/
├── styles/
├── public/
└── package.json
quickstart:
1. Run the create command
2. Open in VS Code
3. Install extensions
4. Start developing at http://localhost:3000

copyBlocks.create: npx create-next-app@latest mynextapp --ts --tailwind --eslint && cd mynextapp && npm run dev
